page.title: 02Hemington
page.content: Farmhouse near Laverton has indications of much earlier work within its structure. Of the 22 houses in the immediate vicinity of Hemington village, 10 are owner occupies, 5 privately rented (in one terrace), 3 agricultural tenancies, 3 tenanted farms (Ammerdown Estate) and one housing association tenancy. The school, which at present has about 40 pupils and two full time teachers, draws only 7 children from Hemington village, and there are no pre-school children in the village - the population is heavily unbalanced towards the 45 plus age group. In Hemington parish as a whole however there are (1981 census) 102 children in the 5 to 14 age group and 47 under 5, together making 23% of the total population, which is above the national average.
